# acathemes

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of __`acathemes`__ is to gather all my favorite ggplot2 themes. 

## Installation

You can install this with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("acastroaraujo/acathemes")
```
